message: Anyone know a good flash developer I can run some questions by?  Mainly "can flash do X" type of questions
gskinner.com guys really know their stuff. No guarantee that they will actually answer your questions, but you can try.
I've been using Flash since 1999. What do you need to know?
the situation is that the users of the site may have crappy computers/bad internet, etc, and wouldn't be able to sustain the upload required to do a nice stream and save on the server side
the question I have, is does the flash video API let you save to the local clients disk, re-play their clip, and then once they are happy, upload it?
Imagine you wanted to implement a video voice-mail site, where users could upload short snippets of video
not that hard, there are a pile of examples of video streaming, etc

Flash's NetStream class (http://help.adobe.com/en_US/FlashPlatform/reference/actionscript/3/flash/net/NetStream.html) allows you to use the publish method to upload to a Flash Streaming Media Server but it's not tuned to convert the camera data to an FLV to save to disc.

It looks like you must use NetStream#publish while you record from the Camera. But you could play around with it and see if you can wait to call NetStream#publish until after they have stopped recording and previewed their video message.
Hmmm... doesn't look like you can publish afterwards, it has to be during.
